How do you report absences? family day c.answer: Under the Child Care Subsidy families are allowed 42 absence days per child, per financial year. These 42 allowable absences can be taken for any reason, including public holidays and when children are sick, without the need for families to provide documentation.

Will Centrelink back pay child care subs.answer: To get Child Care Subsidy you need to submit a claim. You must be using an approved child care provider. If eligible, we'll pay the subsidy directly to your provider. If eligible, we may be able to backdate your subsidy for up to 28 days.
